title: Pasta Mia - Ramat HaHayal
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a separate vegan menu with many choices, including appetizers, mains, and desserts such as lasagna with cashew bechamel, stuffed portobello mushrooms with almond cheese and sun-dried tomatoes, and fresh ravioli and gnocchi. Pasta is made-in-house. Suitable for intimate dinners or groups.
